Flower records. Asteraceae :

cf

,

cf
pallescens
,
Cirsium lappaceum
,
Echinops viscosus
; Brassicaceae :
Alyssum sp.
; Fabaceae :
Medicago sp.
; Lamiaceae :
Teucrium orientale
; Caryophyllaceae :
Minuartia sp.

Sub-generic classification of
Lasioglossum
is complex, and no global consensus has yet been reached across all regions. We therefore present the classically used Old World subgeneric concepts and also add the likely subgeneric placement based on
Gibbs et al. (2013)
and
Kuhlmann et al. (2021)
.
